duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the charge in supporting GumGum’s renewal business by providing clients with an industry-leading end-to-end experience.
Build strategic and long-lasting relationships with key clients.
Present campaign performance and updates to clients or sales team and communicate optimizations to achieve goals.
Support Sales in managing and executing strategic sales opportunities.
Discover incremental opportunities for growth among existing campaigns.
Coordinate internal teams and execute on sold campaigns.
Take ownership of the QBR process for key strategic accounts.
Facilitate the management of all aspects of the campaign internally.
Manage alignment on client success metrics across the rest of the operations department.
Provide feedback to the company on how to best service clients' needs.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree in Business (Advertising/Marketing) or similar experience
